name: Wally+
details:
LooperWally+ was designed on Hotone's smart and simple Wally Looper platform, then enhanced in terms of power, usability, and sophistication. 
Wally fans will appreciate the independent I/O controls and unique tempo knob. 
Augmented features include 24-bit 44.1kHz recording/playback quality, 8 GB internal storage, and 11 savable loop phrase banks. 
Wally+ has USB onboard so you can import/export/manage your loop phrases with the included PC/Mac software.
Features
✪ 24-bit 44.1kHz high quality recording/playback
✪ SAVE button for catching the inspired loops
✪ 11 banks for storing the keepers
✪ 8GB internal storage 
✪ Import, export and manage songs via USB 
✪ Free PC & Mac software for managing phrases
✪ Change loop tempo and volume on the fly
✪ Max. recording time: Totally 330 minutes (max. 30 minutes of each bank)
https://www.hotoneaudio.com/products/skyline/wally-plus
